defaultValue:
This project has truly been a community effort - thanks to all of the pebbledev #pokemon members, and especially to @mathew and @pautomas for the initial UI/functionality, @liammcmains for the many late nights of assistance and support, and @robisodd for his amazing improvements and optimization, many of which we have yet to dazzle you with as we focus on back-end solutions!
-ishotjr

items.defaultValue: We're working on a solution to the recent server issues - in the meantime, random dummy Pokemon data will be generated to demonstrate app functionality.  If you are part of our private beta testing group, you can override the default data with a test server URL that we will provide.
